snippet.title: REAL LiFE 99 NiGHTS - Save 4 Kids with Adley Niko Navey and Friends!! Survive PiRATE iSLAND Forest
snippet.description:
wait... 99 nights iN REAL LiFE?!?

JOIN THE FAM - https://www.youtube.com/@GforGaming

HEY EVERYBODY!! Welcome back to another episode of your favorite gaming and Roblox channel... G for Gaming!! Today we are all gonna be playing this game... wait? It's... real life? Oh no! Turns out we seemed to get transported to 99 Nights in the Forest in real life! We got a bunch of our best friends together to help us defeat the deer and all the deer cultists but in real life! We had to do all the same things we do in Roblox but all over pirate island! First off, we decided to search around for wood and weapons so that we could save all of the kids and save the day! But of course, just like the game, there were wolves and monsters all over! Things got really scary and spooky, especially at night when the deer came out and tried to get us! Luckily Navey was really good at healing and reviving people with our bandages that we found! Adley was also good at going and getting us food like usual while Niko was a good hunter and fighter! We even found a trader that we could sell our wolf pelts and stuff too so that we could get new weapons and tools to help us on our journey! It turns out that 99 nights in the forest is WAY more intense in REAL LIFE! But, we were able to save all of the kids and get them home safely! With the help of all of our friends, it wasn't even... THAT hard! We had such a blast! The whole thing was even covered live on the news by Reporter Dad!

Thanks for Watching!! BYE! PSSSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHHH


enjoy some A for Adley videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/AforAdleyLe...
have a blast with our A for Adley Shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMHpfyAqrjrhn-mRS2bUL0g
share a best day ever with our family: https://www.youtube.com/user/Shonduras
fun best day ever shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgVE...

watch the latest A for Adley video: Navey's Fairy Party - NO PiRATES ALLOWED!! Adley plans a Magical Birthday for Navey and her Friends
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=On0sZg_lJWY


this is our channel G for Gaming!! this is a place that i can share all of my favorite gaming moments!!
